name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with cheddar, lettuce, tomato, onion, and our house sauce.

name: Bacon BBQ Burger
description: Crispy bacon, tangy BBQ sauce, and smoky gouda over a flame-grilled patty.

name: Spicy Jalapeño Burger
description: Fiery jalapeños, pepper jack cheese, and chipotle mayo for a bold kick.

name: Veggie Delight Burger
description: A hearty black bean patty with avocado, sprouts, and vegan garlic aioli.

name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
description: Sautéed mushrooms and creamy Swiss cheese for a rich, savory flavor.
